				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h4>
<hr class="hr-about">  About Us </h4></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h1 class="convhx1">Best Italian Food Restaurant and Pizzeria</h1></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_3">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_5  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h3> THE TALE OF TWO ITALIAN BOYS FROM THE OTHER SIDE OF SICILY, ITALY & NEW JERSEY </h3></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_6 read-more-home  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner">The Red Devil Italian Restaurants are part of a dream …the American dream of entrepreneurship. Big Joe and his partner Little Joe turned their dream into reality in 1960 when, together, they opened their first restaurant.<p></p>
<div class="more-text">
<p>As one of life’s greatest comfort foods, pizza is loved the world over. When it comes to the best pizza delivery in <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/italian-restaurant-tempe-az/">Tempe</a>, <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/italian-restaurant-pinetop-az/">Pinetop</a> and <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/italian-restaurant-phoenix-az/">Phoenix, AZ</a>, nothing beats the delicious flavors and traditional Italian style of Red Devil. As one of the leading family restaurants in the area, we have something for young and old. Enjoy from our range of handmade pizzas custom made to perfection, or select from our range of pasta, sandwiches, entrees or more. Our <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/coupons-specials/">coupons and specials</a> ensure that Italian take out is always on the menu.</p>
<h2 class="home-h2">Sit Back and Relax with Italian Food Delivery</h2>
<p>The name Red Devil was an easy choice because it was already on the sign out front when they bought the joint. Money was tight, so Big Joe and Little Joe had no choice but to put their families to work. Loud arguments, personal sacrifices, long hours, quality ingredients and loyal customers have paid off. Today, with leadership from the second generation, Big Joe’s sons Mike and Joe Digeno Jr., Red Devil thrives in the valley of the sun. With the passing of Big Joe and Little Joe – their traditions, flavors and American dream are carried on to generations to come, thanks to you.</p>
<p>Family owned and operated, Red Devil is one of the leading pizza and pasta restaurants offering service in Pinetop, Phoenix, and Tempe, AZ. Founded on over six decades of tradition, we deliver quality in every single order. With bold flavors and exquisite seasonings, each of our offerings tantalizes the taste buds and will have you coming back for more time and time again. Our delivery restaurants also specialize in <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/catering-service/">catering,</a> <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/wedding-special-events/">weddings & special events,</a> and offer <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/banquet-halls/">banquet rooms</a> with options such as bartenders, customized menus, decorating, and more.</p>
<h2 class="home-h2">Make Your Reservation or Take Out Order Today</h2>
<p>Would you like to choose from <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/menus/starters/">starters</a>, <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/menus/salads/">salads</a>, <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/menus/sandwich/">sandwiches</a>, <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/menus/pizza/">pizzas</a>, <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/menus/pasta/">pastas</a>, or <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/menus/calzones/">calzones</a> for tonight’s <a href="https://www.reddevilrestaurant.com/menus/">menu</a>? Why not try Red Devil, the number one pizza and pasta restaurant in Tempe, Phoenix, and Pinetop, AZ. Book your reservation at <a href="tel:(602)%20267-1036">(602) 267-1036</a> or order your pizza delivery at <a href="tel:(602)%20275-5961">(602) 275-5961</a>.</p>
</div>
<p> </p>
